meanings.definition: To give new energy or strength to
meanings.sent1: After a short break, I will reenergize myself for the next task.
meanings.sent2: I like to reenergize by taking a quick walk outside.
meanings.sent3: I forgot to reenergize my phone before the long journey, so it died halfway through.
meanings.sent4: The fresh air and sunshine always reenergize me like a battery being charged.
meanings.sent5: Listening to my favorite music helps me reenergize and feel ready to tackle anything.

meanings.definition: To revitalize or refresh energy levels
meanings.sent1: A power nap can quickly reenergize you during a busy day.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often reenergize by drinking energy drinks before a competition.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could just press a button to reenergize myself like a robot.
meanings.sent4: The vacation by the beach was just what I needed to reenergize my mind and body.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh coffee in the morning helps me reenergize and start my day off right.
